## City Vitals Watch (Monitor Stats)
### Description
A panel to display vital city stats at a glance. Inspired by City Vitals Watch for CS1.
### Features - Persistent vitals panel (Toggleable) - Scrollable list - Most stats available
### Roadmap Will organize a better roadmap on GitHub, but so far: - Settings to show/hide certain stats - Stat groupings (e.g. deathcare can use either) - Draggable panel - Mini view - And more... (Check GitHub!)
